| Chemical |
| --- |
| Fetal serum |
| Maternal brain concentrations |
| CSF concentrations |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

| Chemical |

[Explanation: The paragraph mentions "fetal serum concentrations" and "CSF concentrations" which are clearly chemical entities. "Fetal serum" refers to a liquid component of the fetus's circulatory system, while "CSF" stands for Cerebrospinal Fluid, which is a clear, colorless liquid surrounding the brain and spinal cord.]
